DataItem.DataItemDefinition: This data item allows for a more convenient handling of the messages at the receiver side by further defining the type of transaction.

Bits.BitsValue: Target reports, flight plan data and basic alerts
Manual attachment of flight plan to track
Manual detachment of flight plan to track

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of the system from which the data are received.

Bits.BitsName: System Area Code fixed to zero

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of the system from which the data are received.

Bits.BitsName: the service identification is allocated by the A-SMGCS

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Position of a target in WGS-84 Coordinates.

Bits.BitsName: Latitude in WGS-84 in twos complement.
Longitude in WGS-84 in twos complement.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Position of a target in Cartesian co-ordinates (two’s complement form)
Mode-3/A code converted into octal representation.
Last valid and credible flight level used to update the track, in two’s complement representation.
Calculated Track Geometric Altitude Calculated geometric vertical distance above mean sea level, not related to barometric pressure.
Calculated Barometric Altitude of the track.
Absolute time stamping expressed as UTC.
Identification of a fusion track (single track number)
Status of track.

DataItemFormat.desc: Variable length Data Item comprising a first part of one-octet, followed by one-octet extents as necessary.

Bits.BitsValue: Transponder Ground bit not set or unknown
track service end (i.e. last message transmitted to the user for the track).
track service begin (i.e. first message transmitted to the user for the track)
Military Emergency present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
Military Identification present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
track not resulting from amalgamation process
SPI present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
Age of the last received track update is higher than system dependent threshold (coasting)
ADS-B data inconsistent with other surveillance information

DataItem.DataItemName: Calculated Track Velocity in Cartesian Coordinates
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Calculated track velocity expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates.
Calculated Acceleration of the target, in two’s complement form.
Calculated rate of Climb/Descent of an aircraft, in two's complement form.
Target (aircraft or vehicle) identification in 8 characters.

Bits.BitsValue: Callsign or registration downlinked from transponde

Bits.BitsName: Characters 1-8 (coded on 6 bits each) defining target identification

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Target size defined as length and with of the detected target, and orientation.

DataItemFormat.desc: Variable Data Item, comprising a first part of one octet, followed by one-octed as necessary.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Ages of the last plot/local track, or the last valid mode-A/mode-C, used to update the system track.

DataItemFormat.desc: Compound Data Item, comprising a primary subfield of up to two octets, followed by the indicated subfields.

Bits.BitsName: Age of the last primary detection used to update the track
Age of the last secondary detection used to update the track
Age of the last Mode A detection used to update the track
Age of the last Mode C detection used to update the track
Age of the last Mode S detection used to update the track
Age of the last ADS report used to update the track
Age of the last ADS-B report used to update the track
Age of the last valid Mode 1 used to update the track
Age of the last Mode 2 used to update the track
Age of the last magentic loop detection
Age of the last MLT detection
Actual track age since first occurrence
Age of the last multilateration detection

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Vehicle fleet identification number.

DataItemFormat.desc: One octet fixed length Data Item.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Number related to a pre-programmed message that can be transmitted by a vehicle.

DataItemFormat.desc: One octet fixed length Data Item.

Bits.BitsValue: Work in progress (maintenance, birds scarer, sweepers...)

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Data specific to Mode-S / ADS-B.

DataItemFormat.desc: Compound Data Item, comprising a primary subfield of two octets, followed by up to 11 subfields.

Bits.BitsName: Communications / ACAS Capability and Flight Status
24 bits Aircraft address, A23 to A0

Bits.BitsValue: Comm. A and Comm. B capability
Comm. A, Comm. B and Uplink ELM
Comm. A, Comm. B, Uplink ELM and Downlink ELM
No alert, no SPI, aircraft airborne
No alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
Alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
Alert, SPI, aircraft airborne or on ground
No alert, SPI, aircraft airborne or on ground
highly manoeuvrable (5g acceleration capability) and high speed (>400 knots cruise)

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: All flight plan related information.

DataItemFormat.desc: Compound Data Item, comprising a primary subfield of two octets, followed by 14 subfields.

Bits.BitsName: The Airport Names are indicated in the ICAO Location Indicators book.
The Airport Names are indicated in the ICAO Location Indicators book.
For details refer to ICAO Annex 14, chapter 5.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Current phase of the flight.
Overview of all important accuracies

DataItemFormat.desc: Compound Data Item, comprising a primary subfield of two octets, followed by up to eight subfields of predefined length.

Bits.BitsName: Estimated Accuracy Of Track Position Cartesian
Estimated Accuracy Of Track Position WGS-84
Estimated Accuracy Of Calculated Track Geometric Altitude
Estimated Accuracy Of Calculated Track Barometric Altitude
Estimated Accuracy Of Track Velocity Cartesian
Estimated Accuracy Of Rate Of Climb/Descent
Estimated accuracy i.e. standard deviation of the calculated position of an aircraft expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates
Estimated accuracy i.e. standard deviation of the calculated position of an aircraft expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates
Calculated Track Geometric Altitude Estimated accuracy
Calculated Track Barometric Altitude Estimated accuracy
Estimated Accuracy Of Track Velocity X_Cartesian
Estimated Accuracy Of Track Velocity Y_Cartesian

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Alert involving the targets indicated in I011/605.
List of track numbers of the targets concerned by the alert described in I011/600.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive Data Item starting with a one-octet Field Repetition Indicator (REP) followed by two-octet track numbers.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Status of up to sixteen banks of twelve indicators.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive Data Item starting with a one-octet Field Repetition Indicator (REP) followed by two-octet track numbers.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Special Purpose Field
Reserved Expansion Field
